name: Gideon's Avenger
originalText: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on Gideon's Avenger.

rulings.text: If an opponent’s creature enters the battlefield tapped, Gideon’s Avenger’s ability doesn’t trigger.
